items.title: The August Book List Round-Up

items.title: Under Threat from State, Florida Public Schools Are Banning These 55+ Books Without Review
items.description: Florida doesn't maintain a state-sanctioned list of banned books, but the state is pressuring schools to remove these 55 books without review.

items.title: Obama to Adapt an SA Cosby Book And More BIPOC Literature News
items.description: This week's news has everything from the best books out in August to a story about a Black cultural haven in Pennsylvania.
